title: Special Education Animation Technology Utilization: Game-Based VR Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education knowledge and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in animation production and educational application using VR-based game elements in smartphone-centric, resource-constrained technical environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design 2D animation game scenarios to enhance language skills for special education recipients.
Learners can evaluate social interaction educational modules with 80% accuracy using animations created in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can develop an implementation plan to apply educational animations—produced via smartphone-based tools—to real-world special education cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
